randomThoughts: Live today in / ALL CAPS
Is peanut butter / your jam?
Be cheeky, but don’t be a butt.
I left my heart in / San Francisco
The grapevine: earth’s first internet
Some of us are / cat AND dog people.
Is there low-fat / food for thought?
Add an exclamation mark to your day.
Shouldn’t hamburgers / be beefburgers?
Yodel while / you work
Matching socks / are overrated
All you need is love / and good food
Dance first. / Think later.
Thursdays are the / mullet of the week
Isn’t head over heels / the right side up?
Are fanny packs / back in style yet?
Fun fact: Snails can / sleep for 3 years
Never judge a book / by its movie.
What if everything / we own sparks joy?
Yodel like no one / is watching
Fun fact: Dolphins / can ride on whales
“Think like a / queen.” – Oprah
“Well behaved women / seldom make history”
We’re on team GIF / pronounced like GIFT
Carrie is like / scary Harry Potter
Black History / is American History
“Freedom is never / given; it is won.”
We <3 curious cats / and rabbit holes
Live each day like / it’s Taco Tuesday
You go, girl! / You too, guy!
We believe closets / are for clothing
Cilantro. / Love it or hate it?
Game day every day. / Yahoo Sports
Unboring your inbox. / Yahoo Mail
This year / resolve to lol more
What about / elf-driving cars?
Chicken or egg? / Maybe it was a tie?
Dial up the awesome / Break the knob off
Some like it hot. / Others like AC.
Anyone have a tattoo / of the word “tattoo?”
How to find a needle in a / haystack? Try a magnet.
When does a billboard / become a philosopher?
Exercise your right to vote. / Nuff said.
Spin a globe / to pick your next vacay.
Is the keyboard / mightier than the sword?
Let’s make Pluto / a planet again
When in Rome / go see the Coliseum
Are you a hot tamale or hot potato? We <3 you either way!
Love someone like you love/  avocados. Lavocado love.
What if no one claps for / Tinkerbell? What then?
